title: Hug A Runner 5K (Los Angeles)
desc: November 20th is National Hug A Runner Day! In honor of this day we are dedicating our November virtual race to Hugging a Runner. ?We will honor one special runner, which will be announced in a few weeks. ?This person will choose the charity that we donate proceeds to.? *Medals will be shipped out in November 2015.? What: ?Complete a 5K! Set a goal for what your finishing time will be and dedicate your run/walk to your favorite runner. When: ?Complete your race any time between November 1 and November 30, 2015.? Where: ? You choose the course and you time yourself (you?ll report your finishing time to us). Why :? Because we want to celebrate all of the runners out there. They each deserve a HUG! ? **If you are a paid MEET ME ON MARS participant you should have received an email with a discount code to use on all of our virtual races this year to save 25% on each race. If you have not received that code email us at moonjoggers@gmail.com.? If? you have not signed up for  MEET ME ON MARS  ( one of the paid registration options) do so now and you?ll be able to save 20% on our virtual races! Sign up? HERE . (Use code SAVE10 to save $10)
